summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganKlairs Supple Preparation Unscented Facial Toner replenishes skin moisture with hyaluronic acid and centella to calm irritation and soothe redness.
details: DetailsBenefitsNon-irritating daily tonerDeeply moisturizing and nourishingStrengthens the skin's barrierBalances pH level of skinKey IngredientsCentella Asiatica Extract: A medicinal herb with powerful soothing benefits that helps calm irritation and rednessHyaluronic Acid: A quenching hydrator that holds up to 1000 times its weight in waterBeta-Glucan: A naturally occurring polysaccharide that boosts skin moisture and calms irritationFormulated WithoutEssential oilsEthanolSiliconeArtificial colorArtificial fragranceItem 2580264How To UseAfter cleansing, apply the toner to clean skin using a cotton pad or hands. Pat with palms for complete absorption.Precautions: For external use only.IngredientsWater, Butylene Glycol, Dimethyl Sulfone, Betaine, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Natto Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate, Disodium EDTA, Centella Asiatica Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Polyquaternium-51, Chlorphenesin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Carbomer, Panthenol, Arginine, Luffa Cylindrica Fruit/Leaf/Stem Extract, Beta-Glucan, Althaea Rosea Flower Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Portulaca, Oleracea Extract, Lysine Hcl, Proline, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Acetyl Methionine, Theanine, Copper Tripeptide-1.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing, apply the toner to clean skin using a cotton pad or hands. Pat with palms for complete absorption.Precautions: For external use only.

reviews.headline: Perfect for hydrating
reviews.comments: I definitely recommend this product! It feels very moisture on my skin and super easy to apply. You don't need a pad at all! It doesn't feel sticky and absorbs easily.

reviews.headline: Did nothing
reviews.comments:
Live in a desert and was hoping it would help improve dryness and help absorb products based on other reviews. Saw zero change. 

Good - dispenses easily and lasts quite a while. Goes on smooth. Gentle and non irritating

Bad - didnt help in any way. Wanted to love it but am struggling to understand its purpose. After morning and night use for close to three months, I don't think it achieved anything for my skin.

reviews.headline: Fantastic toner for dry climates; mature skin
reviews.comments: This is my favorite toner by far.  It contisne no unnecessary phototoxic fragrance or essential oils and has all good for skin ingredients.  It feels cushiony going onc provides a nice moisture boost to one's regimen, is excellent for mature, dry skin and drier climates.  Those with oily skin wikl appreciate that it's not greasy and soaks right in.  To get the maximum effect of the cushiony feeling, I prefer to apply a nickel or quarter size amount directly with my hands to my face, no cotton pad.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: I am 42 with dry skin and fine lines, but generally problem free skin. I was looking for a toner to help restore moisture and elasticity and this one did the trick. I like that this toner is unscented, absorbs easily and is very moisturizing. It is not thick or sticky, but also not watery, so I can apply with my fingers. No feeling of stripping skin, but also feels very clean.

reviews.headline: results overnight
reviews.comments: this has restored my skin's elasticity, cleared my very subborn dry patches, and soothed my irritated dry skin. absolutely reccomend for those with dry skin

reviews.headline: results overnight
reviews.comments: this has restored my skin's elasticity, cleared my very subborn dry patches, and soothed my irritated dry skin. absolutely reccomend for those with dry skin

reviews.headline: average
reviews.comments: i liked it but it wasn't anything exceptional. it didn't improve nor worsen my skin. i like that it's unscented and not super watery. i won't be repurchasing, but if you have normal/dry skin and aren't acne prone then this would be a good basic toner for you.

reviews.headline: Perfect for dehydrated skin
reviews.comments: If youre starting fine lines around your face due to skin dehydration, especially for dry skinned people, this is perfect for reducing those lines

reviews.headline: my go to!
reviews.comments: Literally the best toner I've ever used.  it isnt too watery and isn't too thick.  it doesn't have a scent which I love! The only toner I will ever use!

reviews.headline: HOLY GRAIL TONER
reviews.comments: brings my skin back to life. when i run out, ive tried others but always come back to this one. helps other products absorb better and traps moisture in my skin. love love love!

reviews.headline: Obsessed
reviews.comments: This has been an instant classic in my skincare routine. I have incredibly inflamed, acne-prone skin that is easily congested yet easy dry. This toner really helped layer on hydration without clogging pores, and maintain a healthy skin barrier. Giant bottle, I drop right in my hands and pat into my face right after cleansing.

reviews.headline: New Moisture Workhorse
reviews.comments: Put a ring on it, she's the one. Switching brands immediately, not passing go or collecting $200. This is one of those toners that's a teeny tiny touch on the thicker side, so sometimes I'll put something waterlike under it if I'm feeling extra. Absorbs nicely.

reviews.headline: #1 Favorite Toner
reviews.comments: I love love love this toner! I have dry + sensitive skin and its hard to find toners that don't burn. This one is hydrating, gentle, and just all around perfect. Have purchased it twice so far.

reviews.headline: Holy grail toner
reviews.comments: There's no telling how many bottles of this I have used over the past 4 or so years. I love that the texture is a little thicker than water. I use multiple layers, depending how thirsty my skin feels. My skin loves it

reviews.headline: calms my sensitive and reactive skin within minutes!!
reviews.comments: I'm 45 and my skin is changing. It has become sensitive and reactive to certain products; especially, sunscreens. My irritated face gets red and feels extremely spicy. Klair's calmed my face within minutes -I was amazed. I purchased two more during 21 days of beauty.

reviews.headline: So gentle and hydrating!
reviews.comments: I have tried SO many toners and so many I feel like I can't even notice I put on. This one is so thick its almost like a serum and has become a go to for reparing my skin barrier. Love that it is unscented as well so it never irritates my skin.

reviews.headline: Clear skin
reviews.comments: I wanted a new toner after using Bliss for years. I tried this toner based on reviews and I was not disappointed. It took my skin about two weeks to become accustomed to it. My skin is now much clearer and im getting compliments from strangers.

reviews.headline: Not for my sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin with adult acne that I had finally gotten under control for the better part of a year. I tried this because of the great reviews, and while it does feel really nice, I started breaking out immediately. Thought it was a fluke and continued to use it for a couple of weeks, but every day was something new multiple spots on my face. Will not buy again.

reviews.headline: Daily use
reviews.comments: Such a no brainer. I use a few drops on a damp face, let it set and then do my moisturizer. Would never go without. Keeps skin hydrated and plump

reviews.headline: Worth the money
reviews.comments: Great for oily skin. Not too heavy and you only need a couple drops. If you live in a hot climate put this in fridge! It feels amazing afterwards.

media.headline: I would buy this product my self!

faceoff_positive.comments: I'm almost ashamed to admit that I've been stockpiling this. Also, I have it in various sizes - 180ml bottles, 30ml bottles, 3ml bottles. Basically I am able to bring with me wherever I go so that I never have to be without it. I even use it on my body because I've got really dry skin sometimes. I'm so uncomfortable with not using this that I feel as though I'm going to get a breakout if I use a different toner? Must be some warped psychological effect. I've used various toners before and none of them made me feel like something is happening. Most toner simply feel like overpriced water to me. Some are overly perfumed chemical smelling water, which I absolutely hate. Then I had the chance to try out this from one of the samples I received. This smells so organic and fragrance free. The texture is slightly more tacky than water but still viscous enough to be absorbed easily. I fell in love. As this toner feels so good, I don't even care about the cleansers I use anymore because I figured that any drugstore cleanser works since I'm going to be slapping this on immediately and it would adjust the pH level of my skin to a healthy range. This toner is mild, non-irritating, does not break me out. It is so mild that when it gets into my eye area, it doesn't not sting my tear ducts. In fact, I think a little entered my eyes just now when I used it, but I didn't feel anything. Either this has a numbing agent or it is simply very mild. So given how mild it is, this doesn't do anything to cure acne, FYI so don't be counting on that. This also doesn't minimise your pores. What this does really well is make your skin feel relieved and well moisturised after a thorough cleansing. I kind of noticed that the fine lines on my forehead seem to have reduced ever since I started using this toner. My forehead tends to be extremely dry and wrinkly. Now, it is more plumped and makeup no longer goes on patchy. I'm able to pull a better heist in conning people into thinking that I have stunning complexion. Regarding my method of application, I like to pour it into my palm and pat it in for half a minute. I don't see the value in using a cotton pad because I'm pretty good at cleansing my face and generally will not have leftover dirt or soap on my face after cleaning. So I feel that a cotton pad may be a waste of perfectly good toner. It's absorbing toner away from my skin. If there's one item you want to try from Klairs, it has to be this. I never cared for toners until I started using this.
faceoff_positive.headline: So good that I stockpile this

faceoff_negative.comments:
I wanted to include a toner in my routine again and chose this because of all the positive reviews. 

First impression was that it felt nice on my skin. Didn't feel sticky and all my other skincare items absorbed nicely into it. 

Unfortunately, it left my face in breakouts and bumps within a few days. I took it out of my routine and tried again a couple months later, and it did the same thing. It's been a couple weeks since I stopped using it again and my face is clearing up.

I didn't use any other new products or during my trials, so I know it was this toner.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for everyone :(
